content: ailey pairs two shades of berroco wizard yarn with the rich texture of tunisian crochet to create a stunning shawl this assymetric triangle wraps effortlessly around your shoulders and adds color and warmth to fall looks worked flat ailey begins with only a few stitches and grows with increases along one edge choose one solid and one multicolor shade as shown or find your perfect pairing with two solids or two multis the wizard palette is bursting with options **finished measurements** approximately 77 / 195 5 cm wide x 35 / 89 cm deep along short edge **yarn** berroco wizard 100 g 2 balls each #29104 slate c1 and #2985 onyx c2 **hooks and notions** tunisian crochet hook with 16 / 40 cm cord size m-13 / 9 mm *or size needed to obtain gauge* **gauge** 13 sts and 15 row = 4 in pattern stitch *gauge is measured after blocking to save time and ensure accurate measurements take time to check gauge *
